subcategories.name: Image / Video Generation & Editing
subcategories.what_is_covered: Models that create or edit 2-D or temporal visual content via generative techniques.
subcategories.typical_examples: Generative modeling; Image synthesis/editing; Diffusion-based methods; Optimal Transport; Diffusion Models

subcategories.name: 3-D Object & Molecule Generation
subcategories.what_is_covered: Generating 3-D shapes or molecular structures using geometry-aware or equivariant models.
subcategories.typical_examples: 3D shape generation; neural implicit representations; point cloud reconstruction; equivariant GNNs; 3D molecular generation; drug discovery

subcategories.name: Audio & Speech Synthesis
subcategories.what_is_covered: Producing speech or audio from text or multimodal cues, often via diffusion models.
subcategories.typical_examples: text-to-speech; audio-visual; diffusion

subcategories.name: Continual / Few-Shot / Domain Adaptation
subcategories.what_is_covered: Adapting models continually, with few examples, or across shifting domains.
subcategories.typical_examples: Continual Learning; Few-Shot Learning; Domain Adaptation

subcategories.name: Self-, Contrastive & Retrieval-Augmented Learning
subcategories.what_is_covered: Building rich representations via self/contrastive learning or external retrieval augmentation.
subcategories.typical_examples: Self-supervised Learning; contrastive learning; disentangled representations; clustering; language-modeling; retrieval-augmentation; representation-learning

subcategories.name: Parameter-Efficient Transfer
subcategories.what_is_covered: Adapting large transformers with minimal new parameters and compute.
subcategories.typical_examples: Efficient-transformer-architectures; parameter-efficient-fine-tuning; multilingual-adaptation

subcategories.name: Adversarial & Backdoor Robustness
subcategories.what_is_covered: Defending against adversarial or backdoor manipulations and distribution shifts.
subcategories.typical_examples: adversarial robustness; backdoor attacks; robustness; knowledge distillation; distribution shift

subcategories.name: Uncertainty & Interpretability
subcategories.what_is_covered: Quantifying model confidence and explaining predictions.
subcategories.typical_examples: uncertainty estimation; conformal prediction; model interpretability

subcategories.name: Privacy & Machine Unlearning
subcategories.what_is_covered: Ensuring data privacy and enabling deletion or secure distributed learning.
subcategories.typical_examples: differential privacy; machine unlearning; federated learning; robust optimization

subcategories.name: Pruning, Quantization & Embedding Compression
subcategories.what_is_covered: Compressing networks by pruning, quantizing or embedding reduction for efficient deployment.
subcategories.typical_examples: Network pruning; Sparse_Network_Pruning; Low-precision quantization; Embedding_Compression; Efficient architecture search; Recommendation_Systems

subcategories.name: Equivariant / Geometric Deep Networks
subcategories.what_is_covered: Networks that respect group symmetries to learn geometric or physical structures.
subcategories.typical_examples: equivariant neural networks; group symmetry; geometric deep learning

subcategories.name: Graph Neural Network Theory
subcategories.what_is_covered: Theoretical properties, expressivity and robustness of Graph Neural Networks.
subcategories.typical_examples: Graph Neural Networks; Expressivity; Robustness

subcategories.name: Non-convex & Stochastic Optimization
subcategories.what_is_covered: Algorithms and analysis for nonconvex optimization with stochastic gradients.
subcategories.typical_examples: Nonconvex optimization; Stochastic gradient methods; Convergence analysis

subcategories.name: Neural Network Theory & Neuroscience Inspiration
subcategories.what_is_covered: Theoretical studies and neuro-inspired modeling of recurrent nets.
subcategories.typical_examples: recurrent neural networks; neuroscience-inspired modeling; theoretical analysis

subcategories.name: Core & Offline Reinforcement Learning
subcategories.what_is_covered: Improving sample efficiency and offline policy learning in RL.
subcategories.typical_examples: Reinforcement Learning; Offline Learning; Sample Efficiency

subcategories.name: Multi-Agent & Dialogue RL
subcategories.what_is_covered: Learning cooperation, competition or dialogue among multiple agents.
subcategories.typical_examples: multi-agent reinforcement learning; bandit algorithms; game-theoretic learning; dialogue systems; multi-agent collaboration; reinforcement learning

subcategories.name: Embodied AI & Robotics
subcategories.what_is_covered: Training embodied agents and robots via differentiable simulation and manipulation tasks.
subcategories.typical_examples: Embodied AI; Robotic manipulation; Differentiable simulation

subcategories.name: Vision-Language & Knowledge Reasoning
subcategories.what_is_covered: Joint reasoning across vision and language plus knowledge graphs.
subcategories.typical_examples: vision-language reasoning; knowledge graph learning; compositional generalization

subcategories.name: Video Understanding & 3-D Perception
subcategories.what_is_covered: Temporal and 3-D understanding of videos and dynamic scenes.
subcategories.typical_examples: Video understanding; Temporal modeling; 3D perception

subcategories.name: Physics & Differential Equation-guided Learning
subcategories.what_is_covered: Learning operators governed by physical laws and differential equations.
subcategories.typical_examples: Neural differential equations; Physics-informed operator learning; Spatiotemporal forecasting

subcategories.name: Program Synthesis & Automated Reasoning
subcategories.what_is_covered: Automatically generating code or formal proofs from specifications.
subcategories.typical_examples: Program synthesis; Code generation; Theorem proving

subcategories.name: Combinatorial, Causal & Bayesian Optimization
subcategories.what_is_covered: Optimization over discrete structures, causal questions or Bayesian objectives.
subcategories.typical_examples: Combinatorial optimization; Causal inference; Bayesian optimization
